title: Backend Engineer Intern
description: Designed and developed a custom application performance monitoring system to track and report performance metrics & errors to output channels, enhancing system observability.
Automated software delivery by setting up CI/CD pipelines for testing and deployment, improving code integration and reducing release time.
Developed an Email Verification system and added new unit tests on existing APIs to enhance security.
Deployed backend service on AWS and configured Nginx as a reverse proxy, improving backend performance.

title: Full Stack Developer Intern
description: Helped build interactive UIs and dashboards, improving user experience.
Integrated user analytics, allowing the team to track and analyze user behavior to identify opportunities for further products.
Developed RESTful backend services to compute dynamic content, enabling faster data retrieval.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Co-led a team of 3 developers, building end-to-end client portals for account management, including KYC (Know Your Customer) for secure user verification, as well as features for deposits, withdrawals, and transaction history.
Implemented Redis caching for transaction history, deposits, and withdrawals, improving response times for users and significantly reducing database queries and API call overhead.
Developed and maintained RESTful endpoints for market data retrieval, integrating third-party APIs to deliver live cryptocurrency rates in real-time.
Developed a payment dispute feature in the admin dashboard that allows admins to verify, approve, or reject disputes efficiently.
